areas.description: Quite peaceful residential area with many quaint white traditional villa and shops.  On a river and boarding Spain, this city was originall a fishing village where the caught and canned Sardines.   With a grid layout you can find old historical factory building and warehouses that were used to can sardines.

places.name: Porto de Recreio do Guadiana
places.description: Travelling to and about the Algarve coastline is possible using this Marina located on the boarder with Spain. Yacht Harbours offer anothe way to experience Algrave coastline and nature by boat.  As well as sea water sports, recreation and adventures.
tags: Maximum ship hull size at berthing point : 3 m
Maximum length at berthing point : 20 m
places.address: Av. da República s/n - Apartado 40 8901-909 Vila Real de Santo António

areas.description: Originally a small fishing area that has become a tourist destination for families.  Many small quaint shops restaurants, bars and pubs. Pleny of places to get gifts or find real estate, lawyers and other service providers.

places.name: Mumbai Darbar Indian Eat Out
places.description: Offers authentic Indian food for those days that you are missing it. Indian dining is quite popular in Algarve with many Indian restaurant options. Culturally Portugues dishes reflect the Indian influence of the Exploration periods when the Portugues brought back spices from India.

places.name: Algar Seco
places.description: There is a wood boardwalk access along the tops of the cliffs starting at Boneca Bar restaurant to downtoen Carvoeiro.  There are scenic ocean views from the cliff.  You can see spectacular sunsets and sun rises.

places.name: Walk to downtown Carveiro
places.description: There is sidewalk access in most of the main roads in downtown Carvoeiro.   Scenic walks are avaialble along the coast as well if you prefer to be off the street.  Walking times are about 30 minutes to downtown Carvoeiro from Vale de Milho.  Taxi's are often available downtown if you are too tired or had too much fun to walk back.
